title: Patch Issue anyone?
body: couldnt patch up i havnt no idea what's happend, first its working fine like download on 500-1000 KB per sec speed after it decrese until 0 KB per sec, tried to repair and restart compute, can't deal with this anyone can help?

replies.body: it decreases to 0kb when it is installing the patches this can take 1-10 mins depending on internet speed and computer
I've had the same issue and it's going to 0KB/s before it finishes downloading the patch. It can't exactly install the patch if it hasn't downloaded the patch.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WF5Ekp5F,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-27T01:47:39.178+0000)
>
> I've had the same issue and it's going to 0KB/s before it finishes downloading the patch. It can't exactly install the patch if it hasn't downloaded the patch.

it installs it in parts it will download patches then install them on to your computer and then continue downloading I have experienced this plenty of times it doesn't last long just enough to install the files then it will continue downloading
I think I can rule that out as a possibility. Had the patcher running all night, 12+ hours, and it didn't download a single thing. I can't believe it spent all that time installing nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WF5Ekp5F,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-27T02:59:13.761+0000)
>
> I think I can rule that out as a possibility. Had the patcher running all night, 12+ hours, and it didn't download a single thing. I can't believe it spent all that time installing nothing.

okay try deleting lol_air_client file.
so go to riot games file on you hard drive then, LoL, RADS, Projects, and it should be the 1st one this will delete all your custom settings and item sets though.
This should work I had a problem were mine woud also stop and just stay on it forever and this worked

Honestly I don't think that would work since I was using a fresh installation. I've had it running through the day and, while it is slow, it's working some of the time, just keeps getting stuck on 0KB/s for ridiculous amounts of time. Should be finished in a few days... \*cries in the corner*

If you want you could put it on a usb and mail it, I'll probably get it quicker that way.
